idea-plugin.name: AndroidLocalize
idea-plugin.description:
Android localization plugin. Support multiple languages, No need to apply for key.
  • 1. Select the values/strings.xml.
  • 2. Right-click and select Convert to other languages.
  • 3. Select the language to be translated.
  • 4. Click ok.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• V1.0: Initial release of the plugin.
  • V1.1: Support for automatic detection of source file language.
  • V1.2: Fixed garbled bug.
  • V1.3: Added Overwrite Existing String function. and optimize the experience of choice.
  • V1.4: Added proxy support and fixed bugs.
  • V1.5: Added select all options.

action.description: Translate this strings.xml to other languages that can be used to localize your Android APP.
